EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder - Application deadline approaching.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact the Staffing Team on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
This is a final reminder that our application deadline of 2nd March is fast approaching.
We have already offered over 1500 roles for the summer which means we are almost halfway there! This huge amount of interest does mean that some of our roles are likely to be full in certain areas or for certain dates imminently.
Submitting your application this weekend will mean we can fast-track you through our recruitment process.
What this means for you!
Your application will be reviewed within two weeks You will benefit from a greater choice of assessment dates
and most importantly....
If you are offered a position, you will have your pick of the dates and locations before they fill up altogether!
Click here to continue your application https://staffing.the-challenge.org/Login.aspx?ReturnUrl=%2fsecure%2f
Please contact us on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org if you have any queries or if you are no longer interested in working with us. Please ensure you quote the email reference number below in any correspondence.
We look forward to receiving your completed application soon!
Best wishes, The Challenge NCS Programme seasonal-roles@the-challenge.org CA 1.9k VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
